messages.title: A Record of Delivery. A Promise of More.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Cut the deficit by half, reducing borrowing by £3,000 for every household in Britain. Move more jobs to Scotland, rebalance the economy and away from London.
Given an £800 tax cut to low and middle income workers. Cut Income Tax by a further £400 for ordinary workers.
Delivered the largest ever increase in the state pension. Decent pension rises every year through our 'triple lock'.
The Liberal Democrats will increase health spending across the UK which means £800m more for Scotland.

issues.health: The Liberal Democrats will increase health spending across the UK which means £800m more for Scotland.

quotes.text: 3 great reasons to vote for Jade O'Neil: 1. The Liberal Democrats will cut income tax for people in Glasgow North by another £400 each year. 2. The Liberal Democrats will change the law so that the state pension always rises higher than earnings or inflation every year. 3. The Liberal Democrats will increase health spending across the UK which means £800m more for Scotland.
